outboundReferences.contextLine: It's a fully managed solution to share files in the cloud using standard protocols, such as [[smb-protocol]] (accessible from Windows, Linux, and macOS clients) or [[Network File System (NFS)]] (accessible from Linux and macOS clients).

inboundReferences.contextLine: You can use a storage account as a storage mount. The mount can be a [[azure-file-storage]] or [[azure-blob-storage]].
